resources.string: Habitat for Humanity is a Christian ministry. /nTesting 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123... Testing 123...

We build homes for income qualified families. Habitat then sells the home to the partner family with a 20 year interest free mortgage. Habitat for Humanity is not a hand out, but it is a hand up. We seek to help others in our community.

We have chosen, as our means of manifesting God\'s love, to build adequate and durable homes with those in need of shelter. And we believe that safe and affordable housing is a basic human right and fundamental component of dignity and long-term well-being for every person on earth.
